name: Mavogel Cotton Sleep Eye Mask - Updated Design Light Blocking with Adjustable Nose Bridge, Soft and Comfortable Night Eye Mask for Men Women, Eye Blinder for Shift Work, Includes Travel Pouch, Black
short_description: New Design: We listen to your opinions about the product ! name: YFONG Silk Eye Mask for Sleeping Women & Men for Total Blackout, 100% Pure Mulberry Silk Sleep Mask, 22 Momme 6a Fibers - Blindfold Sleep Mask Side Sleeper Eye Cover with Adjustable Band (Pink)
short_description: Luxury OEKO Certified Silk Material: The YFONG silk eye mask for sleeping is made of 22 momme density, premium grade 6A long fibre, 100% pure Mulberry Silk. Silk is gentle on your skin and hair, aids in hydration and helps prevent dullness, fine lines, and wrinkles. Pure Silk is moisture wicking and helps regulate temperature without absorbing. YFONG Silk Sleep Masks are OEKO certified, which means harmless and non-toxic. Excellent Light-Blocking Capability: Wide Face-Hugging Padded and nose flap design perfectly blocks out all light. Besides, The lining adds two layers of ultra-light blackout pads to effectively block light without adding eye mask weight much, provides you with a total darkness environment, let you enjoy a sound sleep anytime and anywhere. Ultra Soft & Comfortable: Thanks to the natural properties of mulberry silk. The whole silk eye mask is soft, smooth and comfortable to touch. Lightweight and wide full-huging design allows for even and low pressure on the face, eyes and ears. Give you a sleeping in the clouds experience when using YFONG silk sleep mask. whether you are a side sleeper or back sleeper. Premium Adjustable Band to Fit All Head Size: YFONG eye masks for sleep is wide cushioned and extended adjustable band (hook & loop), fits most head circumferences and side-sleepers. The strap can be adjusted to your proper length through the band, and the mask is not easy to fall off. Exquisite Box Packaging - Perfect Present : Each YFONG Silk Sleep Mask is packaged in a beautiful box and comes with a portable storage bag, a care instruction and a silk test card. A Thoughtful Mother's Day Gift She'll Cherish. Surprise your beloved mom, wife, or grandmother with a indulgence this Mother's Day.

name: YIVIEW Sleep Mask for Side Sleeper, Complete Light Blocking 3D Sleeping Eye Mask, Soft Breathable Eye Cover for Women Men, Relaxing Zero Pressure Night Blindfold

Lightweight, cool, smooth fabric feels refreshed and never stuffy. 【Fully Adjustable】Elastic buckle strap easy to adjust for a comfortable sleeping. Suitable for Men Women Kids of different head sizes and won’t catch your hair. 【Warm Tips】Hand wash with water below 40℃ before first use to achieve better use effect. Do not bleach, do not Iron.
